introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: {{salonName}} takes your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy describes what information we collect, how we use it and protect it.

collectedInfo.title: 2. Information We Collect
collectedInfo.description: We may collect the following information:
items: Photos of work results (only with your written consent)

dataUsage.title: 3. Use of Information
dataUsage.description: We use the collected information for:
items: Providing quality services tailored to your needs
Informing about new services and special offers (with your consent)
Improving the quality of our services

dataProtection.title: 4. Data Protection
dataProtection.paragraph1: We take all necessary measures to protect your personal data from unauthorized access, modification, disclosure or destruction.
dataProtection.paragraph2: Only authorized employees who are required to maintain confidentiality have access to your data.

thirdParty.title: 5. Third Party Data Transfer
thirdParty.paragraph1: We do not sell, exchange or transfer your personal information to third parties without your explicit consent, except as required by law.
thirdParty.paragraph2: We may share anonymized statistical information with our partners to improve service quality.

cookies.title: 6. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.content: Our website may use cookies to improve user experience. You can disable cookies in your browser settings.

rights.title: 7. Your Rights
items: Request access to your personal data
Withdraw consent for data processing at any time
Opt out of receiving promotional mailings

dataStorage.title: 8. Data Storage
dataStorage.content: We store your personal data only for the time necessary for the purposes stated in this Policy, or as required by law.

policyChanges.title: 9. Changes to the Policy
policyChanges.content: We reserve the right to update this Privacy Policy. Updates will be posted on this page with the date of the last change indicated.

contact.title: 10. Contact
contact.description: For questions regarding this Privacy Policy, you can contact us:
